## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G11870](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G11870)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>IRE1C</u>
- **Gene Name:** INOSITOL REQUIRING 1C
- **Description:**   Endoribonuclease/protein kinase IRE1-like protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT3G11870.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G11870.1)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [ire1c-1/ire1b-3]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Defective male and female gametophytes.
